title: Luca Petrozzi
text:
Luca Petrozzi (born 12 March 1995, in <a href="Bromley">Bromley</a>) is an English born Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. His usual position is as a Scrum-half, and he currently plays for <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton Rugby</a>.
For <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Pro14">2019–20 Pro14</a> season, he was named as "Additional Player" for <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton</a>.
In January 2015, Petrozzi was also named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad for the <a href="2015%20Six%20Nations%20Under%2020s%20Championship">2015 Six Nations Under 20s Championship</a> and in 2018 in the <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">Italy Sevens</a> squad for the <a href="2018%20Rugby%20Europe%20Sevens%20Grand%20Prix%20Series">2018 Rugby Europe Sevens Grand Prix Series</a>.
